articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered on PC: Specs, launch date, features
articles.description: Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered launches for Windows PC computers on Aug. 12, 2022 from Steam and the Epic Games Store. The remaster will support ultra-wide monitors, advanced ray-tracing, and unlocked frame rates.
articles.content: The remastered version hits Steam and the Epic Games Store next month

articles.title: MLB and players fail to reach labor agreement, league cancels games
articles.description: Major League Baseball (MLB) and its players union failed to reach a labor agreement by the league's Tuesday deadline and as a result, MLB has cancelled the first two series of the regular season, Commissioner Rob Manfred said.
